definition: online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]

sentences.english: E-Gold used for now BUT their own payment processor soon!
sentences.chinese: 虽然现在用eg，但是马上就推出自己的网银。

sentences.english: The hackers then follow their marks as they move to their online bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 黑客就可以根据木马留下的记号跟踪他们的网银账号。

sentences.english: An attacker can send an e-mail about a banking Web site to a user.
sentences.chinese: 攻击者可以将有关网银站点的电子邮件发给用户。

sentences.english: In the body of post write amount of posts and your e-currency account.
sentences.chinese: 在帖子里注明你发帖数量和你的网银。

sentences.english: Keep an eye out for new features in your bank's online system.
sentences.chinese: 对网银账户的系统留个心眼，注意那些新的变化。

definition: Peony Card (credit card issued by Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)
ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
to transfer (money to a bank account)
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
to report the loss of something
to withdraw money from a bank
